00076 inline Parameters::Parameters(void) { init_memory(); }
00077 inline Parameters::~Parameters(void) { free_memory(); }
00078 inline int Parameters::logTerse(void) { return (m_chatter > 0); }
00079 inline int Parameters::logNormal(void) { return (m_chatter > 1); }
00080 inline int Parameters::logExplicit(void) { return (m_chatter > 2); }
00081 inline int Parameters::logVerbose(void) { return (m_chatter > 3); }
00082 inline int Parameters::logDebug(void) { return (m_debug); }
